file_content.text: [This comm station has been deactivated.]
General Aves is starting the assault. Head for the Legislature, catch up with their men inside.
I'm hoping to thank you in person next.
Stay safe, Councilor.
Please, don't. I only hope it makes up for starting this mess.
We couldn't have gotten here without you.
We owe you one.
After seeing all the damage you've undone, I wish I'd done it sooner.
Does the Empire have a plan of attack?
What can I expect?
Without the Ion Wall, all they can do is hit the Republic with everything they have. It won't be pretty.
The Empire might smell an inside job.
You better be careful.
Don't worry. I'm an elected official. Lying is part of the job.
I've been ready for this fight since I landed.
Well, it's about time.
Don't get caught up in revenge. The Republic has to win first.
I must go--the Empire's moving the council to a secure location. No more comm calls.
I bet my life on a Republic victory--don't disappoint me now.
The Ion Wall's been activated, Councillor.
And it worked perfectly. The Empire's scrambling to find reinforcements--now's your best chance.
Incorrect codes. Access denied.
Understood.
